text: The IIHF All-Time Teams are the All-Time Teams of the countries which would had participated at the 2020 IIHF World Championship. To honor the 100-year anniversary of the Ice Hockey World Championships. ==List== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Country!!Goaltender!!Right defenceman!!Left defenceman!!Right wing!!Centre!!Left wing||Honourable mentions|| |- | |Sean Burke |Scott Niedermayer |Chris Pronger |Wayne Gretzky |Mario Lemieux |Sidney Crosby | | |- | / |Dominik Hasek |Frantisek Pospisil |Tomas Kaberle |Jaromir Jagr |Vaclav Nedomansky |Vladimir Martinec | | |- | / |Olaf Kolzig |Uwe Krupp |Christian Ehrhoff |Erich Kuhnhackl |Leon Draisaitl |Marco Sturm | | |- | |Pekka Rinne |Teppo Numminen |Kimmo Timonen |Jari Kurri |Teemu Selanne |Saku Koivu | | |- | / |Arturs Irbe |Sandis Ozolins |Karlis Skrastins |Helmuts Balderis |Sergejs Zoltoks |Olegs Znaroks | | |- | / |Vladislav Tretiak |Vyacheslav Fetisov |Alexander Ragulin |Vsevolod Bobrov |Valeri Kharlamov |Yevgeni Malkin | | |- | / |Vladimir Dzurilla |Lubomir Visnovsky |Zdeno Chara |Peter Stastny |Miroslav Satan |Zigmund Palffy | | |- | |Henrik Lundqvist |Borje Salming |Nicklas Lidstrom |Peter Forsberg |Mats Sundin |Sven Johansson | | |- | |Hans Banninger |Mark Streit |Mathias Seger |Richard Torriani |Hans- Martin Trepp |Ferdinand Cattini | | |- | |Gerry Cosby |Chris Chelios |Ryan Suter |John Mayasich |Patrick Kane |Herb Drury | | |} ==References== All-Time Teams Category:Ice hockey trophies and awards +
title: IIHF All-Time Teams
